data.meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.
data.sentence: The word فِيهِ comes from the root ف ي and is associated with the meanings: Proposition which points to cause, space or time. In, into, amongst, in company with, during, with, of, for, for the sake of, upon, concerning, after, in comparison, about, among, on account of, respecting, by the side of, on, by, against, according to, in respect of.

data.meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.
data.sentence: The word لَمْ comes from the root ل م and is associated with the meanings: Negative particle giving to the present the sense of the perfect; not.

data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word اللَّهُ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
The word فَأُولَئِكَ comes from the root ا و ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to descend, come down, go down, happen, alight at, settle in a place, lodge. anzala - to send down, give. nazulun - that which is prepared for a guest's entertainment, abode, gift. manzil - mansion, station. nazzala - to cause to descend, send down. tanziil - sending down, divine revelation, orderly arrangement and authentic compilation, gradual revelation.
data.sentence: The word أَنْزَلَ comes from the root ن ز ل and is associated with the meanings: to descend, come down, go down, happen, alight at, settle in a place, lodge. anzala - to send down, give. nazulun - that which is prepared for a guest's entertainment, abode, gift. manzil - mansion, station. nazzala - to cause to descend, send down. tanziil - sending down, divine revelation, orderly arrangement and authentic compilation, gradual revelation.

data.meanings: to commit disobedience, go astray, transgress commandment, live in profligacy, disorder, become wicked, profligate, commit lewdness, become perverted, be impious, act wickedly.
data.sentence: The word الْفَاسِقُونَ comes from the root ف س ق and is associated with the meanings: to commit disobedience, go astray, transgress commandment, live in profligacy, disorder, become wicked, profligate, commit lewdness, become perverted, be impious, act wickedly.
The word وَمَنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: possessor/people of, one who recites, superintended/owner, inhabitants/family/people of house or dwelling.
data.sentence: The word أَهْلُ comes from the root ا ه ل and is associated with the meanings: possessor/people of, one who recites, superintended/owner, inhabitants/family/people of house or dwelling.

data.meanings: To restrain from, exercise authority, command, give judgment, judge, be wise.
data.sentence: The word يَحْكُمْ comes from the root ح ك م and is associated with the meanings: To restrain from, exercise authority, command, give judgment, judge, be wise.

data.meanings: To restrain from, exercise authority, command, give judgment, judge, be wise.
data.sentence: The word وَلْيَحْكُمْ comes from the root ح ك م and is associated with the meanings: To restrain from, exercise authority, command, give judgment, judge, be wise.
